flagUpdateToReleasedDescription: when used, all dependencies will be updated to latest, released package version
flagUpdateToNonPinnedDescription: when used, all dependencies that are owned by the current Dev Hub will be set to X.Y.Z.LATEST, unless the X.Y.Z version has been released
examplesDescription:
$ sfdx toolbox:package:dependencies:manage --branch my-feature-branch --targetdevhubusername devhub@org.com
$ sfdx toolbox:package:dependencies:manage --branch my-feature-branch --updatetolatest --targetdevhubusername devhub@org.com
$ sfdx toolbox:package:dependencies:manage --branch my-feature-branch --updatetoreleased --targetdevhubusername devhub@org.com
messagePackageDependenciesFound: Package dependencies found for package directory %s
messagePackageDependencyNotManagedByDevH: The dependency '%s' is not managed by this Dev Hub.  Moving on to next dependency.
messageReviewingOptionsForPackageDepende: Preparing options from Dev Hub for dependency '%s'
messageWhichVersionOfPackage: Which version of package '%s' should be used
